title: Man shot in leg outside St Clair home
content:
By Sept. 7, 2015, 10:02 p.m. 

A man has been shot in the leg while standing outside his home in Sydney's west on Monday night. 

The 49-year-old was hit by at least one bullet as he stood in his driveway on Shadlow Crescent at about 8.30pm. 

He was taken to hospital where he remains in a stable condition. 

It is not known if the shooting was a targeted attack. 

Detectives from St Marys Local Area Command are investigating the circumstances surrounding the shooting and a crime scene has been established. 

Police have urged anyone with information to contact St Marys police or Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
